summary: Both REQ-14 (bulk player upload) and REQ-15 (blue/orange retheme) are largely implemented. REQ-14 has a complete BulkPlayerUploadModal with file upload, textarea input, preview, validation, and summary. REQ-15 has comprehensive theme changes across all major files. However, there are some gaps: the Scorecard page theme updates are only referenced via file summaries, and the WicketModal, EndOfInningsModal, EndOfOverModal modal theming cannot be directly verified from the truncated diffs.

missing_requirements.requirement: All modals (WicketModal, EndOfInningsModal, EndOfOverModal, ConfigureTournamentRulesModal) must use the new blue/orange palette
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include direct content of WicketModal, EndOfInningsModal, or EndOfOverModal files. While LiveScoring.tsx imports them, their internal theming cannot be confirmed from the available diff. ConfigureTournamentRulesModal is referenced in file summaries but its diff content is not shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: The Scorecard page must use the new blue/orange palette with clean borders, elevated shadows, and well-defined hierarchy
missing_requirements.reason: The Scorecard page is mentioned in file summaries as updated but no direct diff content is shown for frontend/src/pages/Scorecard.tsx to verify color class changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Name validation rules beyond the spec: minimum 3 characters, maximum 50 characters, and must contain at least one space
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-14 only specifies validation for non-empty, duplicates, and 11-player team limit. The implementation adds too-short (min 3 chars), too-long (max 50 chars), and no-space (must contain a space) validation rules that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Dark mode CSS custom property overrides in index.css
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only asks for a blue/orange professional theme update. A full .dark mode variant with separate CSS custom properties was implemented but not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Score color tokens (score.runs, score.wickets, score.rate, score.dot, score.boundary, score.six) added to Tailwind config
hallucinated_features.reason: These specific named score tokens were not requested in REQ-15 or anywhere in the build request.
